title: Baltic nations suffering from Russia sanctions win EU relief
description:
The intended recipients are also heading to Brussels with a lengthy wish list, hoping Fitto's plan will reignite their economies. Their concerns will take center stage during a summit of leaders from Eastern European countries in Helsinki on Dec. 16.

title: More than 65,000 unemployed people in Latvia
description:
At the end of October this year, Latvia’s actual unemployment rate was 6.8%, which is 0.1 percentage points higher than in the corresponding period last year, according to data from the Central Statistical Bureau.

Meanwhile, over the past month, Latvia’s actual unemployment rate has not changed sig...
